name: Rumbapocalypse
description:
In Rumbapocalypse, you play as a "rumba" tasked with cleaning all of the stuff humans have left behind after leaving Planet Earth.  After wandering around on a place Rumba hadn't seen before, he gains magnetic powers, which let him connect magnetized items, energized enemies and leftover coins to solve all kinds of puzzles!

Explore a destroyed hub city with up to 6 puzzling levels, gain Energy-coins which will let you access new areas and use the power of magnets to open up stages, and discover hidden places in this positively attractive post-apocalyptic game!

CONTROLS Action
ButtonMove
Control menu
WASD
ShootLeft click
Use magnetic field
Select on menu
Skip cutscene
ShiftRestartR PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE PLAYING

This game was created for the Extra Credits: Game Jam by me and two other friends which helped me with the music. Sadly, at the last stretch while I was implementing the last (and biggest) level, all of my files corrupted.

This is a dev build compiled one day before the jam ended that has some bugs, dev-cheats (like how you start with 7 coins - should have started with 0 in the final release), temporary graphics and other quirks, to show off the work that I put into the game. This is not indicative of the final product I was working towards, but I hope you enjoy the game as it is anyways. ❤️

CREDITS

Art and programming: Erik Bianco

Music tracks: Ezequiel Palladino, Santy Noguera, AstralTempest

Special thanks: VioletJayke

*Created for the Extra Credits Game Jam⁴ in less than 100 hours.
